description.content:
Creates a new user profile in the Profile System with personal data and addresses.

>⚠️ This endpoint is only available for B2B Buyer Portal. Authorization from the Commerce Engineer of the account is required for usage.

## Permissions

Any user or [API key](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/api-authentication-using-api-keys) must have at least one of the appropriate [License Manager resources](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3) to be able to successfully run this request. Otherwise they will receive a status code `403` error. These are the applicable resources for this endpoint:

| **Product** | **Category** | **Resource** |
| --------------- | ----------------- | ----------------- |
| Vtex ID | User Management | **Create User** |
|  |  | **** |

There are no applicable [predefined roles](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/predefined-roles--jGDurZKJHvHJS13LnO7Dy) for this resource list. You must [create a custom role](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/roles--7HKK5Uau2H6wxE1rH5oRbc#creating-a-role) and add at least one of the resources above in order to use this endpoint. To learn more about machine authentication at VTEX, see [Authentication overview](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/authentication).

>❗ To prevent integrations from having excessive permissions, consider the [best practices for managing API keys](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/best-practices-api-keys--7b6nD1VMHa49aI5brlOvJm) when assigning License Manager roles to integrations.

Attaches client profile data to the orderForm.

>⚠️ This endpoint is only available for B2B Buyer Portal. Authorization from the Commerce Engineer of the account is required for usage.

## Permissions

Any user or [API key](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/api-authentication-using-api-keys) must have at least one of the appropriate [License Manager resources](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/license-manager-resources--3q6ztrC8YynQf6rdc6euk3) to be able to successfully run this request. Otherwise they will receive a status code `403` error. These are the applicable resources for this endpoint:

| **Product** | **Category** | **Resource** |
| --------------- | ----------------- | ----------------- |
| Vtex ID | User Management | **Create User** |
|  |  | **** |

There are no applicable [predefined roles](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/predefined-roles--jGDurZKJHvHJS13LnO7Dy) for this resource list. You must [create a custom role](https://help.vtex.com/en/tutorial/roles--7HKK5Uau2H6wxE1rH5oRbc#creating-a-role) and add at least one of the resources above in order to use this endpoint. To learn more about machine authentication at VTEX, see [Authentication overview](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/guides/authentication).

description.content:
The Checkout Custom Card Cayment API allows flows for credit card tokenization in VTEX, covering profile management, card token vault operations, checkout processes, payment gateway interactions, and authentication workflows.

>⚠️This API is only available for B2B Buyer Portal. Authorization from the Commerce Engineer of the account is required for usage.

## Index

### Profile management

- `POST` [Create profile](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/credit-card-tokenization-e2e-tests-api#post-/api/profile-system/pvt/profiles)
- `DELETE` [Delete profile](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/credit-card-tokenization-e2e-tests-api#delete-/api/profile-system/pvt/profiles/-profileId-/personalData)
- `GET` [Get profile cards](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/credit-card-tokenization-e2e-tests-api#get-/api/profile-system/pvt/profiles/-profileId-/vcs-checkout)

### Card token vault

- `POST` [Save card token](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/credit-card-tokenization-e2e-tests-api#post-/api/card-token-vault/tokens)

### Checkout operations

- `POST` [Add items to cart](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/credit-card-tokenization-e2e-tests-api#post-/api/checkout/pub/orderForm/-orderFormId-/items)
- `POST` [Add profile data](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/credit-card-tokenization-e2e-tests-api#post-/api/checkout/pub/orderForm/-orderFormId-/attachments/clientProfileData)
- `POST` [Add payment data](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/credit-card-tokenization-e2e-tests-api#post-/api/checkout/pub/orderForm/-orderFormId-/attachments/paymentData)
- `POST` [Place order](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/credit-card-tokenization-e2e-tests-api#post-/api/checkout/pub/orderForm/-orderFormId-/transaction)
- `DELETE` [Delete account](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/credit-card-tokenization-e2e-tests-api#delete-/api/checkout/pub/current-user/payments/-accountId-)

### Authentication

- `POST` [Start login](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/credit-card-tokenization-e2e-tests-api#post-/api/vtexid/pub/authentication/startlogin)
- `POST` [Validate login](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/credit-card-tokenization-e2e-tests-api#post-/api/vtexid/pub/authentication/classic/validate)

### Payment gateway

- `GET` [Get transaction details](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/credit-card-tokenization-e2e-tests-api#get-/api/pvt/transactions/-transactionId-)
- `GET` [List payments](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/credit-card-tokenization-e2e-tests-api#get-/api/pvt/transactions/-transactionId-/payments)
- `GET` [Get card](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/credit-card-tokenization-e2e-tests-api#get-/api/pvt/accounts/-accountId-)
- `POST` [Send payments](https://developers.vtex.com/docs/api-reference/credit-card-tokenization-e2e-tests-api#post-/api/pub/transactions/-transactionId-/payments)
